name: Tilded~OS
description:
"Hello potential consumer! We at Tilded~Games are proud to unveil our newest installment in our lineup of epic and reliable software to the masses. This here is the most sophisticated PC operating system known to man: Tilded~OS v3! With Tilded~OS on your computer, you will be able to complete all your digital tasks! Entertainment and web browsing? Yes! Word processing and image editing? Absolutely! S̵͕̙̈́̎u̴̼͒m̸̩̭̀m̸̺̕ǒ̸̤ṅ̶̩̾ ̷͍͑̄t̷͍̾͆h̶̹͗͆e̷͔̯͂ ̷̨͇̑̌d̴̟͐̓a̵̖͗r̷̤̈k̷̗̰̈́ ̵̬̂͠e̷̗̪͊͑ŗ̸͝o̴̲͐b̵̛̬̪̎d̶̯̍a̵̢̢̋ĺ̷͖̆ ̶̫͌͜ğ̴͇̖ȍ̸̡̩d̵͍͙̅̚š̶͚̑ ̸̖̋̾o̷̯̰̊̿f̷̼̞͋̓ ̶̲͆ẗ̵͖́͠h̷̫͔́̿ẻ̸͔ ̸̩͂e̷̦͐̕ĺ̷͖̯y̶͇͍̓̕ś̴̫̏ī̸̜̫ả̶̳̣̌n̴̲͖͆͛ ̴̥̲̈́̚p̶̮͙̆̿l̴̼̖͋̽a̷̘͔̚ň̶̲̺͗ẽ̵͚̫͒?̷̫̆

You betcha! So what are you waiting for? Download Tilded~OS and enhance your computing experience today!

Tilded~Games is not responsible for injury, seizures, or death.

Not all individual bugs have been expunged."

-(Tilded~Games Ad Catalogue, circa 2002)

This is just a silly little game I made for April Fools' Day 2021! If enough people enjoy it, perhaps I will expand on this idea more in a sequel or major title! But be warned, there is some scary stuff in this title (not really).

(Based off of Windows XP, obviously)
